title: Glottography dataset derived from Goddard 1999 "Native Languages and Language Families of North America"
description: This dataset provides non-overlapping, traditional language ranges for the languages of North America as depicted in Goddard 1000.
citation: Goddard, Ives. 1999. Native Languages and Language Families of North America. (Studies in the Anthropology of North American Indians Series.) In  Smithsonian Institution (ed.) Revised and enlarged edition, with additions and corrections edn. University of Nebraska Press. Sheet map, foldedpp.
